mapper.update: update COM_OPERATION_LOG set ACTION_TYPE = #{actionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, ACTION_URL = #{actionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_USER = #{actionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_TIME = #{actionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_CONTENT = #{actionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_URL, ACTION_USER, ACTION_TIME, ACTION_CONTENT from COM_OPERATION_LOG
